Description: Pottery ostracon containing part of a letter written in Coptic.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.26, pl.19)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82573) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82573)
Condition: incomplete,fragmentary (2 fragments joined); poor( faded); salt removal
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 19:4 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
